title: How to Make Savoury Muffins

steps.headline: Prepare your extra ingredients.
steps.description: This may be grating the cheese, organizing herbs and spices etc.

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 190C, grease or line a standard 12 muffin tray (it will make 6 jumbo muffins).
Make the basic muffin recipe.
steps.description: Sift dry ingredients in one bowl and mix the wet ingredients in another. The wet mix should be well combined.

steps.headline: Add your extra ingredients to the wet mix and stir until mixed through.
Add the wet mix to the dry mix and stir with a spoon or spatula.
steps.description: Mix briefly and avoid beating it, its preferable to have no huge lumps at all, but a few little lumps are fine.

steps.headline: Should the mix be too stiff, add an extra splash of milk.
steps.description: It will be thick, but it should not resemble a dough. The extra ingredient variation can affect the consistency.

steps.headline: Spoon the batter into the pans evenly.
Bake 20-25 minutes or until cooked & golden.
Remove and allow to cool.
steps.description: But they are just as nice warm.

text: Prepare your extra ingredients. This may be grating the cheese, organizing herbs and spices etc. Preheat oven to 190C, grease or line a standard 12 muffin tray (it will make 6 jumbo muffins).  Make the basic muffin recipe. Sift dry ingredients in one bowl and mix the wet ingredients in another. The wet mix should be well combined. Add your extra ingredients to the wet mix and stir until mixed through.  Add the wet mix to the dry mix and stir with a spoon or spatula. Mix briefly and avoid beating it, its preferable to have no huge lumps at all, but a few little lumps are fine. Should the mix be too stiff, add an extra splash of milk. It will be thick, but it should not resemble a dough. The extra ingredient variation can affect the consistency. Spoon the batter into the pans evenly. They should be 2/3rd full. Bake 20-25 minutes or until cooked & golden. Jumbo muffins may need 25-30. Remove and allow to cool. But they are just as nice warm. Finished.
sentences: This may be grating the cheese, organizing herbs and spices etc.
Preheat oven to 190C, grease or line a standard 12 muffin tray (it will make 6 jumbo muffins).
Sift dry ingredients in one bowl and mix the wet ingredients in another.
The wet mix should be well combined.
Add your extra ingredients to the wet mix and stir until mixed through.
Add the wet mix to the dry mix and stir with a spoon or spatula.
Mix briefly and avoid beating it, its preferable to have no huge lumps at all, but a few little lumps are fine.
Should the mix be too stiff, add an extra splash of milk.
It will be thick, but it should not resemble a dough.
The extra ingredient variation can affect the consistency.
Spoon the batter into the pans evenly.
Bake 20-25 minutes or until cooked & golden.
But they are just as nice warm.
